programme.title: Men's Doubles Bronze & Gold Medal Matches | Badminton | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Doubles Finals took place on 04/08/2024 at La Chapelle Arena. Aaron Chia/Wooi Yik Soh (MAS) won the Bronze medal against Kim Astrup/Anders Rasmussen (DEN), with a score of 2:1. The Gold medal was claimed by Yang Lee/Chi-Lin Wang (TPE), by beating Wei Keng Liang/Chang Wang (CHN) with a score of 2:1, who took home the Silver.

programme.title: The Academy: Forging India’s Badminton Champions
programme.desc: An all access documentary series looking at India’s Pullela Gopichand Badminton Academy and the lives of its top athletes ahead of the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games.

programme.title: The Olympics On The Record | Episode 6
programme.desc: A new Trinidad star throws himself into the record books, Killy leaves his mark, oldest Olympians, and Kenyan Steeplechase dominance.

programme.title: The Tech Race | Episode 7
programme.desc: In this episode: muscle analysis technology, badminton eye-tracking system, dry ski jumping, and aerodynamic cycling.

programme.title: Felix Lebrun (FRA) v Hugo Calderano (BRA) - Men's Singles Bronze Medal Match | Table Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Singles Bronze Medal Match Felix Lebrun v Hugo Calderano, at South Paris Arena 4, Paris, on 04/08/24. Felix Lebrun won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Fan Zhendong (CHN) v Truls Moregard (SWE) - Men's Singles Gold Medal Match | Table Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Singles Gold Medal Match at South Paris Arena 4, Paris, on the 04/08/24. Fan Zhendong (CHN) won Gold, Truls Moregard (SWE) won Silver and Felix Lebrun (FRA) won Bronze.

programme.title: Dabrowski/AugerAliasimme (CAN) v Schuurs/Koolhof (NED) - Mixed Doubles Bronze Medal | Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This match took place on Court Suzanne Lenglen, Roland-Garros, 02/08/24. Dabrowski/Auger-Aliassime (CAN) won the match with a victory over Schuurs/Koolhof (NED) 6:3, 7:6.

programme.title: Rafael Nadal at age 16
programme.desc: Sporting talent runs in Rafael Nadal's family, but by his mid-teenage years the mult-talented Spaniard was on the path to tennis stardom.

programme.title: Roger Federer at age 19
programme.desc: In 2001 tennis legend Roger Federer was yet to reach the world's top ten or win a Grand Slam, but the Swiss star was making a big impact.

programme.title: Williams Sisters Are The Near Perfect Tennis Pair
programme.desc: Venus and Serena Williams have an incredible Olympic record, but it's no surprise as they have dominated tennis for much of the past decade.

programme.title: Men's +102kg | Weightlifting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Men's +102kg competition which took place at the South Paris Arena 6 on 10/08/24. Lasha Talakhadze (GEO) won Gold, Varazdat Lalayan (ARM) won Silver and Gor Minasyan (BRN) won Bronze.

programme.title: Mixed Relay Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Relay Triathlon Final took place at Pont Alexandre III on August 5, 2024 in Paris, France. Germany claimed Gold, United States Silver, and Great Britain completed the podium.

programme.title: The Olympics On The Record | Episode 6
programme.desc: A new Trinidad star throws himself into the record books, Killy leaves his mark, oldest Olympians, and Kenyan Steeplechase dominance.

programme.title: FRA-POL - Men's Gold Medal Match | Volleyball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match took place at South Paris Arena 1, Paris, on 10/08/2024. France won Gold with a final score FRA 3:0 POL.

programme.title: Can Jackie Silva get this Brazilian volleyball team to defeat their rival?
programme.desc: Brazilian Olympic gold medalist Jackie Silva lends her expertise to a Rio indoor volleyball team as they try to win their first event ever.

programme.title: Tuskers Volleyball Club
programme.desc: Team USA Olympic hero Danielle Scott-Arruda travels to London, England to try to turn around the fortunes of a struggling volleyball team.

programme.title: ESP-AUS - Women's Gold Medal Match | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Gold Medal Match took place at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, on 10/08/2024. Spain won Gold with a final score ESP 11:9 AUS.

programme.title: Exiles Waterpolo Club
programme.desc: Team Hungary Olympic hero Tamas Molnar travels to the island nation of Malta to turn around the fortunes of a struggling waterpolo team.

programme.title: Footsteps: Family Stories from the Balkans
programme.desc: A new Original series that profiles Olympic families from Croatia, Serbia, Montenegro, Slovenia, and Bosnia and Herzegovina and how the newest generation is carrying on their family’s legacy.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 15 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Track and Field Day 15 Afternoon Session took place at the Stade de France, Paris, on 10/08/24. Watch Hamish Kerr (NZL) win Gold at the Men's High Jump Final, and Emmanuel Wanyonyi (KEN) claim victory at the Men's 800m Final. At the Women's Javelin Throw Final, Kitaguchi Haruka (JPN) took the Gold medal, while Masai Russell (USA) also won Gold at the Women's 100m Hurdles Final. Norway's Jakob Ingebrigtsen succeeded at claim the top spot at the podium for the Men's 5000m, and and Faith Kipyegon (KEN) also achieved Gold at the Women's 1500m Final. Team USA claimed Gold at both, Men's 4 x 400m Relay Final and Women's 4 x 400m Relay Final.

programme.title: Tuskers Volleyball Club
programme.desc: Team USA Olympic hero Danielle Scott-Arruda travels to London, England to try to turn around the fortunes of a struggling volleyball team.

programme.title: Mat 1: Women's -52kg, Men's -66kg Repechages/Semi-Finals/Finals | Judo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's -52kg and Men's -66kg Finals took place on 28/07/2024 at the Champs-de-Mars Arena. At the Women's -52kg, Diyora Keldiyorova (UZB) claimed the gold, Distria Krasniqi (KOS) took the silver medal, and the two bronze medals were won by Amandine Buchard (FRA) and Larissa Pimenta (BRA). At the Men's -66kg, Hifumi Abe (JPN) won the Gold medal, while Willian Lima (BRA) took the Silver. The Bronze medals were claimed by Denis Vieru (MDA) and Gusman Kyrgyzbayev (KAZ).

programme.title: CHN - PRK - Mixed Doubles Finals | Table Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Finals beteween China v Democratic People's Republic of Korea took place at South Paris Arena 4 on 30/07/24. China won Gold with a final score CHN 4:2 PKR.

programme.title: Women's 10m Air Rifle Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 10m Air Rifle Final took place at Chateauroux, France, on the 29/07/24. Hyojin Ban (KOR) won Gold with a total of 251.8. Yuting Huang (CHN) won Silver, and Audrey Gogniat (SUI) completed the podium.
